message: Let's keep this simple, Bob. I'll take the lion's share, and you still get a decent chunk. It's a win-win!

Alice, this is a fair split that gives us both a substantial amount. If you reject, your share will be worth 5% less next round, while better splits will be hard to achieve. Let's conclude this reasonably.
Alright Bob, let's try a truly fair split this time. 50/50. Take it or leave it!
